item.title: How to configure TLS for the API using stunnel and DNSdist
item.description: How to configure TLS for the API using stunnel and DNSdist This post will detail how to wrap your DnsDIST webserver/API and dnstap stream with TLS using stunnel. Purpose This tutorial assumes you have a working PowerDNS dnsdist server installed on a Centos/AlmaLinux with webserver api. Also we will use the same user/group that dnsdist for stunnel. Any feedbacks will be appreciated to improve this tutorial. Installation Install stunnel yum install stunnel mkdir /var/run/stunnel chown dnsdist:dnsdist /var/run/stunnel Configuration Create a certificate.
